EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Pete, Totally understand, thanks so much for the update! Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> P M [mailto:eightdigit@live.com] Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2012 12:20 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Pete Manning Hi Sara,I decided to perform the contract and billing myself so I can gain the experience. I am learning from doing this but I still may use your services for a future client. PeteSubject: MBO Partners / Pete Manning Date: Wed, 16 May 2012 09:50:36 -0500 CC: To: eightdigit@live.com <mailto:eightdigit@live.com> From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>Hello Pete, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going? Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xNjgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE2OCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODc3NjYmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MDk2MzMmZW1haWxpZD1laWdodGRpZ2l0QGxpdmUuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMTc5Ny0xMTM1MjEzJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56u8oW6a1lMI/0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBrI/qLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, there’s real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xNjgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE2OCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODc3NjYmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MDk2MzMmZW1haWxpZD1laWdodGRpZ2l0QGxpdmUuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMTc5Ny0xMTM1MjEzJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56u8oW6a1lMI/0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBrI/qLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent. Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>
